text: Hi everyone.  Goby here, was trying to send the email of my logged in users into HubSpot chat, so it would stop showing uknown visitor and would stop having to ask every user what their email is when we technically already ahve.  Can anyone point me to the right channel to ask this question?
Hi Goby, I would try asking in the <#C019VT42R8X|workflows> room, someone in there may be able to help you.
:wave::skin-tone-6: Hey y’all.  I’m Adrian.  New to HubSpot.   Excited to join the community.
